UX and Big Data

  • 12 August, 2014 at 7pm
  • The venue for this event will be announced soon.

The UX Brighton event for August will be looking at the challenges of designing for big data. Speaker lineup and venue will be announced soon.

Deposit

There is a Â£5 deposit for each ticket. If you would like your deposit returned, we will issue a refund as long as you attended the event and then email us a refund request within 3 days after the event. The proceeds go t

owards paying for the beer and venue hire, and helping fund future evening events.

Canceling

Ticket cancellations before the event must be requested by noon Friday before the event.
